Original meaning 本义: Meaning withered and dead.

Usage example 用法举例: 槁枯 gǎo kū (withered)

槀字的基本解释

槀
gǎo
同“槁”。

槀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gǎo］
同“槁1”。
[②]［kào］
同“槁2”。
[③]［kǎo］
同“槁3”。
[④]［gǎo］
［《廣韻》古老切，上晧，見。］
(1)草。通“稾”。
(2)引申为草率，简略。参见“槀4殯”、“槀4葬”。
(3)见“槀4本”。
(4)箭干。
(5)姓。金有槀氏。见《金史·隐逸传·宋可》。

槀字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　槀； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页545第16
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?苦浩切，音考。【說文】枯木。一作槁。【易·說卦】離爲火，其于木也爲科上槁。【註】草木空中者，必枯槁也。　又乾魚謂之槀。【禮·曲禮】槀魚曰商祭。【註】槀，乾也。與《周禮》辨魚物爲鱻薧之薧同。　又【集韻】口到切，音靠。義同。　又【唐韻】古老切，音縞。槀本，藥名也。【荀子·大略篇】蘭茝藁本。　又枯槀之槀，亦讀作縞。【禮·樂記】止如槀木。　又積也。【左傳·哀三年】富父槐去表之槀，道還公宮。　又與藁通。【馬融·長笛賦】持箭槀而莖立。【註】箭、槀，二竹名。藁字原从竹，作竹下槀。

考證：〔【禮·曲禮】祭槀魚曰商。〕　謹照原文改槀魚曰商祭。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　槀; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 545 16
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Hard cut, sound test. [Said the text] dead wood. Haunted. [Yi·Said Gua] Li is the fire, and its Yumu is also the Keshang. [Note] Those who are in the air will wither.　The dried fish is called 槀. 【Rite·Music Ceremony】Zhiyu is said to be a business festival. [Note] Ye, do it. It is the same as that of "Zhou Li" which distinguishes the fish as the fish.　[Jiyun] The mouth is cut, and the sound depends on it. The same meaning.　[Tang Yun] Ancient cut, soundless. The name of the medicine is also the name of the medicine. 【Xunzi·A Brief Introduction】Lan Fu Gao Ben.　It's dry and dry, and it's also pronounced 缟. 【Rite·Le Kee】It is just like a wood.　It is also accumulated. [Zuo Zhuan·Ai Three Years] The rich father Huai went to Biaozhizhi, and Dao returned to the palace.　And Gaotong again. 【Ma Rong·Flute Fu】Holding arrows and standing stems. 【Note】Arrow, 槀, two bamboo names. The character Gao was originally from bamboo, and was made from bamboo. Textual research: [[Ritual·Quli] worshipping the fish as a merchant. 〕 　 I would like to change the sacred fish according to the original text.
